PagedDocumentView
public class PagedDocumentView.PageFlowStrategy
extends javax.swing.text.FlowView.FlowStrategy

A flow strategy for paging. Fragments views as needed.

Method Detail

layout

public void layout(javax.swing.text.FlowView fv)
Update the flow on the given MyFlowView. By default, this causes all of the rows (child views) to be rebuilt to match the given constraints for each row. This is called by a MyFlowView.layout to update the child views in the flow.

Overrides:
layout in class javax.swing.text.FlowView.FlowStrategy
Parameters:
fv - the view to reflow
